Young kids actually have more taste buds which are solely responsible for detecting bitter things (yes they're different types of taste buds but they're scattered evenly on the tongue, not like how it use to be taught like the "tongue map" which is just false) like  alkaloids which are found in broccoli and other plants to prevent them from accidentally eating any wild plants which may be poisonous. That's why kids hate eating their vegetables (greens especially), to them they taste a lot more bitter.
